Number of COVID-19 cases in Florida soars, with 8,942 cases in last day; previous record of 5,508 set 2 days ago. By comparison, the highest number of daily cases in Ontario (with 2/3rd the population) was 640 on April 24. Story to be updated at this link: https://t.co/eEqkNOnlI6

The US just recorded its highest number of new coronavirus cases in a single day ‚Äî nearly 36,000 ‚Äî and several states still haven't reported their full caseloads. Prior high was 34,203 on 4/25, at the end of a brutal month. Virus is soaring in FL, TX, AZ. https://t.co/ISxgHjTw4c
